name: Around The Jungle
description:
You're a balled up and ensnared explorer in the jungle, and your goal is to escape the depths of the jungle. This game was created for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam, and our theme was "Stuck In A Loop".

Controls: 

  • Click, drag, and release left mouse button in opposite direction you want to launch the player.

Once you get to the end, you're transported back to the beginning of the level to try your luck again. Your tongue strength multiplier increases each time you complete the loop. Try to beat your best time!
